products.title: AutEx™ 96 Nucleic Acid Extractor
products.body: The Avam® AutEx™ 96 is a revolutionary tool for molecular biology, offering unmatched precision, speed, and reliability in PCR applications. Its advanced features, including rapid thermal cycling, sophisticated program management, and exceptional temperature control, make it a cornerstone for any lab committed to achieving consistent and reproducible results.

products.title: Avam® NAsafe™ Nucleic Acid Molecular Transport Medium
products.body: Avam® NAsafe™ is an advanced nucleic acid transport medium designed to collect, inactivate, and preserve microbial and human nucleic acids with unparalleled efficiency. Ideal for molecular diagnostics, genetics research, and sequencing applications, NAsafe™ ensures sample integrity from collection to analysis.

products.title: DNA VersaKit
products.body: Facilitate streamlined DNA purification with the DNA VersaKit™, compatible with Avam® AutEx™ platform for automated processing of up to 96 samples, offering rapid and reliable extraction of high-quality DNA from various sample types.
